backend/main.mo: Defines the main canister with access control, user approval, and CRUD maps for alumni profiles, events, announcements, gallery images, and activities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new state by adding gallery and activity maps and initializing new ID counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like text providing high-level summaries for major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark mode using CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/admin/Activities: Admin panel listing activities with options to create, edit, or delete them using ActivityEditorDialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActivityEd: Dialog for creating, editing, or deleting activities, including title, description, and photo URL management.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryAdm: Admin interface for managing gallery images, allowing creation, editing, and deletion via GalleryEditorDialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/GalleryEdi: Dialog component for creating, editing, and deleting gallery images with validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/admin/MembersAdm: Admin panel for viewing and managing member approval statuses with filtering and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnly.tsx: Conditional wrapper that renders children only for admin users, otherwise showing an access-denied card.
frontend/src/components/AlumniCard.tsx: Card UI component displaying a compact alumni profile summary with name, year, department, and location.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileDet: Dialog component presenting full alumni profile details including contact info, bio, and location.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileFor: Form component for creating or editing an alumni profile with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementAdmi: Admin panel with a button to open the announcement composer dialog.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCard: Displays an announcement's title, date, and content in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementComp: Dialog for creating announcements with form state, validation, and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer showing copyright info and the build version label.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with navigation, auth controls, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper combining the app header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button that handles login and logout using Internet Identity with loading states.
frontend/src/components/BackendUnavailab: Error card shown when backend connectivity fails, offering a retry button.
frontend/src/components/BuildVersionLabe: Displays the current build version from configuration.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryFilters: UI controls for filtering the alumni directory by name, year, and department.
Admin panel for creating events via the event editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Displays event details including date, time, location, and description, with past-event styling.
frontend/src/components/EventEditorDialo: Dialog form for creating, updating, and deleting events with validation and backend mutation hooks.
Wrapper component that checks authentication, backend availability, and approval status before rendering children, showing appropriate prompts or errors.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Ensures a user is authenticated before rendering children, showing a loading state or sign‑in prompt when needed.
frontend/src/config/buildInfo.ts: Exports the build version string from environment variables.
frontend/src/hooks/useAccess.ts: Hook that aggregates authentication, approval, and admin status into a unified access-control object.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor, refetching dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendStatus.ts: Tracks backend readiness with timeout handling and provides a retry mechanism.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hook that exposes the current user's identity, principal strings, and profile loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and status tracking using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries whether the current authenticated caller is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors for profiles, events, approvals, and gallery actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, borders, and global styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query and Internet Identity context providers, then renders App.
frontend/src/pages/ActivitiesPage.tsx: Fetches and displays activities with loading/error states, showing cards with titles, descriptions, and optional photos.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders admin dashboard with permission checks, tabbed management panels, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Loads and displays announcements with backend status checks, handling loading, empty, and error states.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Provides searchable and filterable alumni directory with backend checks and profile detail dialog support.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Displays upcoming and past events in tabbed layout with backend checks and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Displays a gallery of images with loading/error states and a fallback when no items are available, using RequireApproved for access control.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero content, feature cards, authentication-aware buttons, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows an authenticated approved user to create or edit their alumni profile with backend status checks, loading states, and save handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based query cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, plugins, and content paths for styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, issues, and architectural notes for the alumni app’s build state.
